full_summary:
********************************

### Acquisition and Classification of Airborne Topographic LiDAR Data in Newfoundland and Labrador

**Reference Number:** cb-884-12893517
**Publication Date:** 2024-03-11

**Request for Proposal (RFP) Notice:**

The Government of Canada, through Natural Resources Canada (NRCan), is seeking proposals from interested bidders for the acquisition and classification of airborne topographic LiDAR data in Newfoundland and Labrador. The objective of this RFP is to award one (1) contract for this service.

**Service Requirements:**

- Acquisition of airborne topographic LiDAR data
- Classification of acquired data

**Location:** The services will be delivered in Newfoundland and Labrador, Canada.

**Selection Criteria:**

The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price.

**Trade Agreements:**

This RFP is open to bidders who are subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Bidder Information:**

Prospective bidders can download the solicitation document from [the provided link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33851/npp---nrcan-5000079881.pdf).

**Contact Information:**

For any questions or clarifications regarding this RFP, please contact:

Marie-Josée Michaud
Email: [marie-josee.michaud@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:marie-josee.michaud@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca)
Phone: 418563-6916


Reply to this tender will only be considered if it is received by 14:00 EST on March 26, 2024.
